name: PitchBlack
description:
Basically this just inverts all colors on the site.
Since most of it is white this turns it pitch black for the most part.

I can probably change a lot if you want me to. 
Just let me know what you would like to see and i will see if i can implement it.
additional_info:
Changelog:

v0.6 
- changed button designs
- changed inverts on coins and images so that they are in their native color again
- altered logo colors
- altered link highlighting
- changed coloring to be more clear on raising and falling numbers

v0.5
- added outline to buttons

v0.4 
- bug fixes

v0.3
- added color transitions to give the page a smoother look
- changed graph colors to make it more distinct
- added some box shadows to focus areas
- preview image updated

v0.2
- Adjusted button designs
- Changed font colors
- Inverted Profile pictures again so that they show up normal
- Inverted colors for exchangeable coins (sadly only works in coin overview)
- changed alerts to be better readable
- preview image updated

v0.1 
Just filter nothing else
